title: Clara [DVD]
creator_credit: Van Sowerine, Philippa Campey, Film Victoria and Film Camp
brief_description: An expressive although wordless evocation of a child’s grief, “Clara” uses silicone models and stop motion animation to portray a young girl’s reactions to the death of someone close. (Awards: Chicago International Film festival 2005, Best Animated Film, Cannes Film Festival 2005, Special Mention Best Short Film category)
